products.description: Top in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
products.material: Cotton which is a soft and versatile natural fibre harvested from the cotton plant Elastane

products.description: Short jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool. Ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted top in a soft rib knit with a wide neckline at the front and a deep, round neckline at the back. Long trumpet sleeves and a straight hem.
products.material: Viscose 80%, Polyamide 20%, Polyamide, also called nylon, is a synthetic fibre made from oil (a fossil resource).Viscose is a regenerated cellulose fibre commonly made from wood, but the raw material could also consist of other cellulosic materials.

products.description: Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
products.material: Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn. Recycled polyester is polyester made from PET bottles or end-of-life textile waste. The PET bottles or textile waste is mechanically recycled and processed into new yarn.

products.description: Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and lace-trimmed flutter sleeves.
products.material: Recycled cotton is cotton made from textile waste in production or from end-of-life textile waste. The waste is mechanically recycled and spun into new yarn.

products.description: Short-sleeved shirt in a lyocell weave. Regular fit with a turn-down collar, French front and straight-cut hem with a slit in each side. Fabric made from lyocell is super soft, wrinkle resistant and drapes beautifully.
products.material: TENCELâ„¢ Lyocell is a regenerated wood-based fibre made from wood pulp. It is produced in a closed-loop process where chemicals are reused.

products.description: 5-pocket jeans in cotton denim with a slight stretch for good comfort. Straight leg and a regular fit from the waist to the hem with a comfortable, looser feel around the whole leg. Regular waist and a zip fly. This is denim that lasts.
products.material: Elastane is an elastic synthetic fibre made from oil (a fossil resource).

products.description: Baseball jacket in soft, felted fabric with lightly padded sleeves in a contrasting colour. Regular fit with press-studs down the front and welt front pockets with a press-stud. Small, ribbed stand-up collar and matching ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Inner pocket with a press-stud. Quilted lining.
products.material: Cotton, Polyester, Polyurethane, Recycled polyester, Wool
